name: Nera Systems
description: Nera Systems specializes in privacy-preserving technologies for AI and Machine Learning. The company develops innovative tools using Privacy Enhancing Technologies (PETs) and SW/HW co-design to protect sensitive data throughout the AI/ML lifecycle. By offering scalable, privacy-first solutions, Nera Systems enables organizations to leverage the power of AI while ensuring the highest standards of data privacy and security, empowering safe and responsible innovation.
one_liner: Nera Systems specializes in privacy-preserving technologies for AI and Machine Learning. The company develops innovative tools using Privacy Enhancing Technologies (PETs) and SW/HW co-design to protect sensitive data throughout the AI/ML lifecycle. By offering scalable, privacy-first solutions, Nera Systems enables organizations to leverage the power of AI while ensuring the highest standards of data privacy and security, empowering safe and responsible innovation.
